error.message: Unable to find a @SpringBootConfiguration, you need to use @ContextConfiguration or @SpringBootTest(classes=...) with your test

testcase.error: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Unable to find a @SpringBootConfiguration, you need to use @ContextConfiguration or @SpringBootTest(classes=...) with your test
testcase.system-out: 13:47:26.682 [main] DEBUG org.springframework.boot.test.context.SpringBootTestContextBootstrapper - Neither @ContextConfiguration nor @ContextHierarchy found for test class [EventsApplicationTests]: using SpringBootContextLoader 13:47:26.686 [main] DEBUG org.springframework.test.context.support.AbstractContextLoader - Could not detect default resource locations for test class [edu.lawrence.events.EventsApplicationTests]: no resource found for suffixes {-context.xml, Context.groovy}. 13:47:26.688 [main] INFO org.springframework.test.context.support.AnnotationConfigContextLoaderUtils - Could not detect default configuration classes for test class [edu.lawrence.events.EventsApplicationTests]: EventsApplicationTests does not declare any static, non-private, non-final, nested classes annotated with @Configuration. 13:47:26.729 [main] DEBUG org.springframework.boot.test.context.SpringBootTestContextBootstrapper - Using ContextCustomizers for test class [EventsApplicationTests]: [ExcludeFilterContextCustomizer, DuplicateJsonObjectContextCustomizer, MockitoContextCustomizer, TestRestTemplateContextCustomizer, DisableObservabilityContextCustomizer, PropertyMappingContextCustomizer, Customizer]
